name: Chromaker
description:
Uncover each level using a limited paint supply. Only two levels available currently, more to be added in the future!

Attributions:

Sprites Artist and Web Layout Designer: Spencer Cohen

Stencil Shaders: https://nielson.dev/2015/12/splatter-effects-in-unity-using-the-stencil-buffer

Tutorial Fonts: https://www.dafont.com/paintlova.font?back=author : Paintlova by inst.ink!type
Background Music: https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/183881/
Splat Sound Effect: http://soundbible.com/1728-Spit-Splat-2.html
Landing Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/nextmaking/sounds/86003/
Checkpoint Sound Effect: https://freesound.org/people/Kastenfrosch/sounds/162468/

Known Bugs: Sound cuts out when starting game and collecting stars.
